inclusion.criterion: serum albumin for the previous month is < 3.7 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Protein catabolic rate less than 1.0 g/kg/d on at least 2 occasions over the past 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Progressive unintentional weight loss more than 2.5% of the initial or ideal body weight and/or patients who are less than 90% of Standard Body Weight
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjective Global Assessment Score consistent with Moderate to Severe Malnutrition within the last month
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Biochemical parameters of malnutrition defined by 1 of 2 of the following: Serum transferrin concentration less than 225 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is able to transfer with minimal or no assistance
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not taking a caloric nutritional supplement for the last 30 days (e.g. Nepro, ProStat, Boost,etc)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Active auto-immune, inflammatory or infectious disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Documented malignancy within the last 12 months
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 32-year-old obese woman who came to the clinic with weight concerns. She has sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape.
